cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers

Interface I_WekaTest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardAlgorithmTester, StreamAlgorithmTester

    public interface I_WekaTest
    The class I_WekaTest defines an interface for testing WEKA classifiers.
    Version:
    1.0, 05/02/13
    Author:
    Rob Lyon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean loadModel(java.lang.String path)
      Loads the classifier model at the path specified.
      boolean predict(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String outputPath, java.lang.String predictionsPath)
      Make predictions on never before seen instances.
      void processNegativePrediction(java.lang.String outputPath, java.lang.String data)
      Processes data items given a positive label.
      void processPositivePrediction(java.lang.String outputPath, java.lang.String data)
      Processes data items given a positive label.
      boolean reset()
      Resets the classifier implementing this interface.
      boolean saveModel(java.lang.String path)
      Saves the classifier model to the path specified.
      int[][] testStatic(java.lang.String testSet, java.lang.String outputPath)
      Tests the classifier, but does not learn on the test examples (static data set equivalent).
      int[][] testStatic(java.lang.String testSet, java.lang.String outputPath, boolean recrodMissclassifications)
      Tests the classifier, but does not learn on the test examples (static data set equivalent).
      boolean train(java.lang.String path)
      Trains the classifier.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        boolean train(java.lang.String path)
        Trains the classifier.
        Parameters:
        path - the training set path.
        Returns:
        true if trained successfully, else false.

      • testStatic

        int[][] testStatic(java.lang.String testSet,
                   java.lang.String outputPath,
                   boolean recrodMissclassifications)
        Tests the classifier, but does not learn on the test examples (static data set equivalent).
        Parameters:
        testSet - the path to the test set.
        outputPath - the path to write results to.
        recrodMissclassifications - a flag that when true, tells the classifier to record all the mistakes made on data for which there are labels.
        Returns:
        confusion matrix describing binary classification outcomes.

      • testStatic

        int[][] testStatic(java.lang.String testSet,
                   java.lang.String outputPath)
        Tests the classifier, but does not learn on the test examples (static data set equivalent).
        Parameters:
        testSet - the path to the test set.
        outputPath - the path to write results to.
        Returns:
        the confusion matrix corresponding to classifier outputs.

      • reset

        boolean reset()
        Resets the classifier implementing this interface.
        Returns:
        true if the learning model was reset successfully, else false.

      • predict

        boolean predict(java.lang.String data,
                java.lang.String outputPath,
                java.lang.String predictionsPath)
        Make predictions on never before seen instances.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to make predictions on.
        outputPath - the log path to write to.
        predictionsPath - the path to write predictions to.
        Returns:
        true if predictions were made successfully, else false.

      • saveModel

        boolean saveModel(java.lang.String path)
        Saves the classifier model to the path specified.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to save the classifier model to.
        Returns:
        true if the learning model was saved correctly, else false.

      • loadModel

        boolean loadModel(java.lang.String path)
        Loads the classifier model at the path specified.
        Parameters:
        path - to the model to load.
        Returns:
        true if the learning model was loaded from disk successfully, else false.

      • processPositivePrediction

        void processPositivePrediction(java.lang.String outputPath,
                               java.lang.String data)
        Processes data items given a positive label.
        Parameters:
        outputPath - the path to write positive predictions to.
        data - given a positive class label

      • processNegativePrediction

        void processNegativePrediction(java.lang.String outputPath,
                               java.lang.String data)
        Processes data items given a positive label.
        Parameters:
        outputPath - the path to write positive predictions to.
        data - given a negative class label
